item.title: 卢比暴跌令印度央行降息之路更加复杂：决策指南
item.description: 印度储备银行今年的最后一次利率决定被证明是最棘手的一次，政策制定者必须在创纪录的低通胀率与暴跌的货币和 8%以上的经济增长之间进行权衡。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India’s last interest rate decision of the year is proving to be one of its trickiest, with policymakers having to weigh up record low inflation against a plunging currency and 8%-plus economic growth.】

item.title: 关税让税率下降变得更加棘手
item.description:
中央银行避免了高利率带来的灾难，但新兴市场做得最好。【原文：

Central banks avoided disaster on climbing down from high rates, but emerging markets did it best.

】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券因 2019 年以来最高拍卖需求而上涨
item.description: 日本 30 年期债券在一次拍卖会上吸引了自 2019 年以来最强劲的需求，因为收益率上升吸引了投资者。【原文：Japan’s 30-year bonds gained after an auction of that maturity drew the strongest demand since 2019 as elevated yields lured investors.】

item.title: 中国长债期货在重要政策会议召开前下滑
item.description: 由于投资者撤出固定收益基金，中国的长期债券期货大幅下跌，凸显了北京高级别政府会议前的不安情绪，这些会议可能会影响到明年的政策。【原文：China’s long-dated bond futures slumped as investors withdrew from fixed-income funds, underscoring jitters ahead of high-level government meetings in Beijing that may shape policy into next year.】

item.title: 上田表示，日本央行只能在较大范围内衡量中性利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行只能在一个较大的范围内估计所谓的中性利率可能在哪里，因为人们对日本央行本月再次加息的可能性越来越大。【原文：The Bank of Japan can only estimate within a wide range where the so-called neutral interest rate might reside, Governor Kazuo Ueda said, as expectations mount over the likelihood authorities will get closer to that point with another hike this month.】

item.title: 高盛称铜价 "突破 "11000 美元不会持久
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. injected some caution into the debate over copper’s prospects, saying its surge past $11,000 a ton will prove short-lived as there’s still more than enough metal to meet global demand.】

item.title: 中国猪肉价格回落表明消费者信心疲软
item.description: 中国的猪肉价格今年以来一直在下跌，而且看来还会更低，政府为扑杀种猪群所做的努力以及季节性需求的拉动都不足以阻止猪肉价格的下滑。【原文：Chinese pork prices have been in retreat all year and look set to go even lower, with government efforts to cull the breeding herd and a seasonal demand boost not enough to arrest the slide.】

item.title: 国际文传电讯社称普京将在俄罗斯会见普拉博沃
item.description: 据国际文传电讯社报道，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将于本月晚些时候在俄罗斯会见印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin will meet with Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto in Russia later this month, according to Interfax.】

item.title: 关税不确定性继续给印度卢比带来压力
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 被电话逮捕图画小说
item.description:
禁止发短信。没有访客。无法逃离。她陷入了印度新的数字噩梦。【原文：

No texting. No visitors. No escape. She was caught in India’s new digital nightmare. 

】

item.title: 高市重申 1972 年尊重中国对台湾看法的立场
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈重申了该国的一贯立场，即理解并尊重中国关于台湾是其 "领土不可分割的一部分 "的观点，但并未明确同意 "一个中国 "原则。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi reiterated the country’s long-held position that it understands and respects China’s view that Taiwan is an “inalienable part of its territory,” without specifically agreeing to the ‘One China’ principle.】

item.title: 中国发出 2022 年以来最强烈信号，要求减缓人民币升势
item.description: 中国将人民币每日参考汇率设定在明显低于预期的水平，这表明中国央行的目标是限制有管理货币的涨幅。【原文：China set its daily reference rate for the yuan at a level that was significantly weaker than estimates, suggesting the central bank is aiming to limit gains in the managed currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚收益率因加息押注升至今年最高点
item.description: 由于越来越多的人猜测澳大利亚央行将转回加息以降低通胀，澳大利亚债券收益率升至今年最高水平。【原文：Australia’s bond yields rose to the highest level this year amid growing speculation the central bank will switch back to raising interest rates to bring down inflation.】

item.title: 日本通胀预期显示日元有进一步走软的风险
item.description: 对日本消费价格上涨的押注抑制了经通胀调整后的债券收益率，进而削弱了债券对日元的支撑能力。【原文：Bets on rising consumer prices in Japan are keeping a lid on bond yields when adjusted for inflation, in turn reducing their ability to support the yen.】

item.title: 致命洪灾造成的 200 亿美元损失显示亚洲气候风险不断上升
item.description: 自上月下旬以来，南亚和东南亚部分地区发生的特大洪灾已造成 1300 多人死亡，损失至少 200 亿美元，凸显了气候变化和极端天气给该地区快速增长的人口和经济带来的日益严重的风险。【原文：Devastating floods have killed more than 1,300 people and caused at least $20 billion in losses since late last month across parts of South and Southeast Asia, underscoring the increasing risks from climate change and extreme weather for the region’s fast-growing populations and economies.】

item.title: 海外债务销售放缓，外资银行追逐卢比交易
item.description: 印度的外国贷款人面临着离岸债务需求不振的局面，他们正把目光投向一个新的目标：印度不断增长的卢比债券市场。【原文：Foreign lenders in India facing tepid demand for offshore debt are setting their sights on a new target: the country’s growing rupee bond market.】

item.title: 汇丰 "寻椅之旅 "历尽艰辛，终得 "主场之手 "安然无恙
item.description: 布兰登-尼尔森（Brendan Nelson）在担任汇丰控股有限公司临时主席数周后，改变了主意。【原文：Weeks into his job as interim chairman of HSBC Holdings Plc, Brendan Nelson had a change of heart.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭支出激增，加息预期升温
item.description: 澳大利亚 10 月份的家庭支出大幅超出预期，创下 2024 年 1 月以来的最大增幅，为明年加息提供了更多理由。【原文：Australia’s household spending handily surpassed expectations in October to post its biggest increase since January 2024, boosting the case for an interest-rate hike next year.】

item.title: Entel 将单独竞购智利电信公司，撇开美国移动公司
item.description: Entel SA 表示将不再与 America Movil SAB 联合竞购 Telefonica SA 旗下的智利分部，而是将对单独参与竞购进行评估。【原文：Entel SA said it will no longer bid jointly with America Movil SAB for Telefonica SA’s Chilean unit and will instead evaluate participating alone.】

item.title: 运价飙升 467% 标志着各种商品的贸易被颠覆
item.description: 从能源到大宗矿石，全球各大洋的大宗商品运输费用将在年底出现罕见的暴涨，原因是冲突、制裁和产量膨胀破坏了全球供应线。【原文：Rates to ship commodities from energy to bulk ores across the world’s oceans are heading for a rare year-end surge as conflicts, sanctions, and swelling output upend global supply lines.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会再次推迟备受争议的卖空披露截止日期
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会今年第二次推迟了对冲基金和其他大型投资者遵守备受关注的卖空和相关股票借贷信息披露规定的最后期限。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission delayed for the second time this year the deadline for hedge funds and other big investors to comply with much-watched disclosure rules for short selling and related stock lending.】

item.title: GB 能源公司寻求在 2030 年前新增 15 千兆瓦清洁电力
item.description: 英国新成立的国有能源公司希望调动 150 亿英镑（200 亿美元）的私营部门资金，为 15 千兆瓦的清洁电力和储能资产提供资金支持。【原文：The UK’s new state-owned energy company is hoping to mobilize £15 billion ($20 billion) of private-sector finance to help fund 15 gigawatts of clean power and storage assets.】

item.title: 林吉特反弹和财政实力助推马来西亚债券势头
item.description: 马来西亚不断改善的财政前景、缓和的通胀和富有弹性的货币增强了其债券的吸引力，使其债券在明年继续上涨。【原文：Malaysia’s improving fiscal outlook, moderating inflation and resilient currency are enhancing the appeal of its bonds, positioning them for continued gains into next year.】

item.title: 银行家们为越南 IPO 热潮做好准备，人才争夺战一触即发
item.description: 富时罗素指数（FTSE Russell）可能在 9 月份将越南提升为新兴市场，这使得投资银行纷纷扩充人手，以迎接大量首次公开募股。【原文：Vietnam’s potential upgrade to emerging-market status by FTSE Russell in September has investment banks bulking up staff in anticipation of a flood of initial public offerings.】

item.title: 米莱的劳动改革让银行与金融科技公司之间的关系再度紧张起来
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）即将推出的劳动改革计划正在重新引发该国银行与快速发展的金融技术平台之间长期存在的紧张关系。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei’s upcoming labor reform plan is reviving longstanding tensions between the country’s banks and its fast-growing financial technology platforms.】

item.title: 石油保持小幅上涨，关注乌克兰谈判和委内瑞拉问题
item.description: 由于投资者权衡了乌克兰停火的前景以及美国和委内瑞拉之间紧张局势的影响，石油保持了涨势。【原文：Oil held a gain as investors weighed the outlook for a ceasefire in Ukraine and the fallout from tensions between the US and Venezuela.】

item.title: 美国就业数据支撑降息预期，白银维持在峰值附近
item.description: 白银接近历史高位，此前美国的薪资数据增强了人们对美联储将在今年最后一次政策会议上降息的押注。黄金微涨。【原文：Silver traded near an all-time high, after US payroll data reinforced bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in its final policy meeting of the year. Gold edged up.】

item.title: 并购热潮助推日本上市公司业绩创纪录下滑
item.description: 日本的经济规模只有美国的七分之一，但其上市公司数量却几乎与美国相当。今年，这一趋势急剧逆转。【原文：Japan has nearly as many listed companies as the US with an economy only a seventh the size, and for more than a decade, the number only rose. This year, the trend sharply reversed.】

item.title: 中国人民银行努力控制人民币升值，人民币汇率逼近 7 美元兑 1 美元
item.description: 人民币正逐步接近1美元兑7元的关键心理价位，这反映了人们对中美关系改善的乐观情绪，但人民币的逐步升值表明中国政府正在严格控制其收益。【原文：The yuan is inching close to a key psychological level of 7 per dollar, reflecting optimism over improved US-China relations but the gradual appreciation shows Beijing is tightly managing its gains.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑增长预示着经济增长
item.description: 新西兰住宅建筑在第三季度出现反弹，这进一步表明新西兰经济在央行刺激政策的影响下正在复苏。【原文：New Zealand residential building rebounded in the third quarter, adding to signs the economy is recovering in response to central bank stimulus.】
